Chinese: 沒想到……究極的數碼寶貝居然……

English:
[p], that was amazing! That was something
more than common strength!
Chinese:
[p]，你幹得不錯呢……
我覺得我稍～微瞭解你的力量了。
Korean:
[p], 꽤 하는걸…
네 힘, 조~금이지만 안 것 같아
German:
[p], das war fantastisch!
Das war noch mehr als Teamwork!

English:
This was supposed to be it... This Digimon was
meant to bring new values to the world. To
finally open their eyes...
Chinese:
那隻數碼寶貝會給這個世界帶來“新價值”，
應該是命運……
Korean:
그 디지몬이, 이 세계에 "새로운 가치"를 가져오는 것은
운명이었을 터…
German:
Das war die Idee dahinter ... Dieses Digimon hätte
der Welt neue Werte schenken sollen.
Ihnen endlich die Augen öffnen ...

English: How? How could this have happened...?!
Chinese:
為什麼……
為什麼會這樣……
German: Wie? Wie konnte das nur passieren ...?!

English:
Once blind, now I see... It was my eyes that have
been opened.
German:
Einst war ich geblendet, doch jetzt vermag ich zu
sehen ... meine Augen wurden geöffnet.

English:
You have such power within, [p].
You hold so much, standing as both the one that
can forge destiny, and its unshaper.
Chinese:
[p]，你擁有
改變命運的力量、創造命運的力量……
Korean:
[p], 너에게는
운명을 바꾸는 힘이, 운명을 개척하는 힘이 있어…
German:
In dir ruht solche Kraft, [p].
Du kannst das Schicksal formen, oder aber
Verderben bringen.

English:
I must keep careful watch over you. Yes, very
careful indeed. For the Destiny that you choose,
that you create, will be very interesting indeed.
Chinese:
看來我一定得親眼見證
你接下來會創造出怎樣的命運呢……
Korean:
네가 앞으로 어떤 운명을 만들어 가는지
지켜봐야겠어…
German:
Ich muss dich genau beobachten. Sehr genau.
Denn das von dir gewählte und geformte
Schicksal wird wahrlich interessant sein.

English: The time has come. We must return.
Chinese: 好了，暫時先回去我們的“所在地”吧。
German: Die Zeit ist gekommen. Wir müssen zurückkehren.
